maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/245/set.text: Localisation des Cibles dans la Zone.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Now we enter the realm of \c[3]Ebony Forest\c[0]!
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Et maintenant nous entrons dans la \c[3]Forêt d'Ébènes\c[0] !

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: As expected...\. it's full of trees.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Comme son nom l'indique...\. c'est plein d'arbres.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Yet there are no evil wolves in this forest. It's just viruses as always.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Mais pas d'inquiétude, il n'y a pas de grand méchant loup dans cette forêt. Juste ces virus.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Also no bugs. I'm sure Emilie would be glad to hear that.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Et sinon, pas d'insectes. Je suis sûr qu'Emilie serait ravie de l'entendre.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Seriously, though.\. Emilie and her fear of bugs...\. I don't quite get it.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Mais sérieusement.\. Emilie et sa phobie des insectes...\. Je comprends pas trop.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: She made such a huge deal out of the Faj'ro Temple boss. That giant moth, right?
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Elle nous a fait tout un plat pour le boss de fin du \v[area.heat-dng.name]. La mite géante, tu te souviens ?

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: But when I asked her about the midboss...\. that antlion?\. No problem there!
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Mais pour le boss du milieu...\. ce fourmilion ? Aucun problème pour elle !

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Yeah, apparently it's all good because it's "slow" and "stuck in the sand".
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Oui, apparemment pour elle, ça va, parce que c'est "lent" et "coincé dans le sable".

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Personally, I thought the antlion was much higher on the scary scale.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Personnellement, j'aurais cru que le fourmilion lui filerait bien plus les jetons.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Right? Well, that's Emilie for you.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: N'est-ce pas hein ? Mais bon, c'est Emilie.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Over there is a pretty interesting spot!
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Par là, il y a un coin assez intéressant !

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.orig: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Ebony Forest\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/510/set.text: Parlez à Lukas dans la \c[3]Forêt d'Ébènes à \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour continuer sa visite.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: I call this here the \c[3]field of the indecisive flowers\c[0].
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: Ici, j'appelle ça le \c[3]champ des fleurs indécises\c[0].

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: Indecisive because they can't decide on what height to grow.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: Indécises, car elles n'ont pas réussies à se décider jusqu'à quelle hauteur elles devaient pousser.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: I mean just look at them. Some are stuck on ground level, others several meters high.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: Je veux dire, regarde-les. Certaines ne dépassent pas du sol, alors que d'autres font plusieurs mètres de haut.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: Look, I can't even explain a lake to you, so what do you expect now?
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: Écoute, je ne peux même pas t'expliquer ce qu'est un lac, donc qu'est-ce que je pourrais bien dire là-dessus ?

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: Anyway, those flowers are awfully convenient for an elaborate jumping path, don't you think?
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: En tout cas, ces fleurs sont un peu trop bien disposées pour faire un bon parcours de saut, tu trouves pas ?

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: I mean this wouldn't be CrossWorlds without unlikely jumping paths literally everywhere.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: Je veux dire, CrossWorlds ne serait pas CrossWorlds sans tous ses parcours de saut improbables partout.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: The only thing I'm missing here is the treasure chest to collect.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: La seule chose qu'il manque ici, c'est le coffre au trésor avec la récompense.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: So I suppose we both can guess when those flowers will come into play.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: Mais on peut déjà deviner quand ces fleurs entreront en jeu.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: Enough of this forest. Let's go back to the lake. There is one more location I want to show you.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: Bon, assez pour cette forêt, revenons au lac. Il y a encore un endroit que je veux te montrer.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.orig: Head back to \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Crimson Lake\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/511/set.text: Revenez au \c[3]Lac Pourpre de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour continuer la visite de Lukas.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/512/set.orig: Is there really nothing else you'd like to do?
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/512/set.text: Il n'y a vraiment rien d'autre que tu aimerais faire ?

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/514/set.orig: Hah, told you we'd be jumping over these flowers.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/514/set.text: Ha ! Je te l'avais dit qu'on finirait par sauter sur ces fleurs.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/538/set.orig: Come on, Lea. Let's call it a day.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/538/set.text: Allez, Lea. Arrêtons-nous là pour aujourd'hui.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/538/set.orig: There's still time for the trial building tomorrow.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/538/set.text: Demain on aura toujours le temps pour le bâtiment d'épreuve.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/541/set.orig: Enemies already?\. Let us enter the damn building first!
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/541/set.text: Des ennemis ? déjà ?\. Laissez-nous déjà entrer dans ce satané bâtiment !

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Donc...\. Est-ce qu'il faut qu'on entre ?

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: Honestly, I don't have a good feeling about this.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: ... Pour être honnête, j'ai un mauvais pressentiment.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: There will probably be more high-level enemies in there.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Il y aura sans doute encore d'autres ennemis de haut niveau là-dedans.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: Not that this matters much for you, but still...\. with you being like this today...
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Non pas que ça change quelque chose pour toi, mais bon...\. vu comment tu es en ce moment...

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: And with you being like this today...
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Et vu comment tu es en ce moment...

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: Should we continue another time?\. There is no reason to rush this, right?
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Est-ce qu'il faut remettre ça à plus tard ?\. On a aucune raison de se presser, non ?

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: It really would help if you'd respond... at all.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Ça m'aiderait si tu pouvais au moins me donner une réponse...

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: I mean...\. I understand why you'd feel down in a situation like this.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Je veux dire...\. Je comprends pourquoi on pourrait se sentir mal vu la situation.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: But...\. things don't have to stay that way.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Mais...\. ce n'est pas fini pour autant, Lea.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.orig: I'm sure we'll find a way out.\. Out of this place...\. out of this game...
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/560/set.text: Je suis sûr que l'on s'en sortira.\. Qu'on sortira d'ici...\. Qu'on sortira du jeu...

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/561/set.orig: Here we are. For real this time.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/561/set.text: Nous y voilà. Pour de vrai cette fois.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/561/set.orig: They might throw another high level enemy at us, so I'll be counting on your support in that case.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/561/set.text: Ils vont probablement nous mettre un autre ennemi de haut niveau, donc je compterai sur toi pour m'aider.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/561/set.orig: They might throw another high level enemy at us, so better keep your guard up.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/561/set.text: Ils vont peut-être nous balancer un autre ennemi de niveau élevé, donc reste bien sur tes gardes.

maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/561/set.orig: Can't wait to see what kind of room they'll show us this time.
maps/arid/forest-1.json/entities/561/set.text: J'ai vraiment hâte de savoir quel genre de salle ils vont nous sortir cette fois.
